query.mssql: create table {0} ([ReportSessionId] varchar(256) NOT NULL, [RowNumber] int, [ShortName] nvarchar(max), [LastName] nvarchar(max), [JobTitle] nvarchar(max), [Department] nvarchar(max))
query.postgres: create table {0} (ReportSessionId citext NOT NULL, RowNumber int, ShortName citext, LastName citext, JobTitle citext, Department citext)

query.default: select * from Sungero_Reports_AcquaintanceForm temp where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId
